LanguageData.OE_QueenCurse.label: cursed
LanguageData.OE_QueenCurse.description: The curse fully disarms the target and increases incoming damage. The curse has a very long duration.
LanguageData.OE_Redline.label: Redline
LanguageData.OE_Redline.description: A special Dominator's mode that raises their combat potential and movespeed.
LanguageData.OE_Redline.stages.reboot.label: reboot
LanguageData.OE_RedlineAftereffect.label: Reboot
LanguageData.OE_RedlineAftereffect.description: Rebooting Dominator's core systems after using the Redline ability.
LanguageData.OE_Chaos.label: Chaos
LanguageData.OE_Chaos.description: Mental debuffs from the effects of the Chaos.
LanguageData.OE_Vanguard.label: Vanguard
LanguageData.OE_Vanguard.description: A special Dominator's program that reducing incoming damage with small reducing movespeed.
LanguageData.OE_MechCamouflage.label: camouflage
LanguageData.OE_MechCamouflage.description: Active inner stealth module which renders Dominator invisible.
LanguageData.OE_LordRedline.label: grand Redline
LanguageData.OE_LordRedline.description: A special Chaos Lord's mode that raises their combat potential and movespeed.
LanguageData.OE_MechLordCamouflage.label: shadow walk
LanguageData.OE_MechLordCamouflage.description: Active inner stealth module which renders Chaos Lord invisible.
